      • getkNearestNuclei

        public java.lang.Integer[] getkNearestNuclei(int k,
                                    int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int index,
                                    int radius)
        Return k nearest Nuclei to a given point(x,y) if they are within given radius. Only search in specified slice. TODO why only one return value not k??? => radius
        Parameters:
        k - size of return set
        x - - coordinate of search point
        y - - coordinate of search point
        index - of image stack
        radius - in which to search for kNN
        Returns:
        indices of found nuclei
